title: Juan learns long list of words most likely forget

content.question: If Juan tried to learn a long list of words, he would be most likely to forget words that

choices.label: appeared near the end of the list
appeared in the middle of the list
were very unlike the rest of the words

content.answer: appeared in the middle of the list

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
